label: Booking
comment: A transaction which results in the recording of an entry in an account, such as an entry in a bank account or ordering transport services.

datatypeProperties.comment: The debit date, time, date time, or other date time value of this financial booking.
The credit date, time, date time, or other date time value of this financial booking.

referencedBy.comment: The financial booking related to this financing summary document.
